author: Staff Reporter
text:
A section of bank employees, affiliated to All India Bank Employees Association (AIBEA), staged an agitation here on Thursday evening alleging that the State Bank of India had been trying to force ‘unfair’ working conditions on the employees of its five subsidiary banks.

Workload increase

D. Manoharan, district general secretary of AIBEA, told reporters that attempts were being made to increase the workload of clerical staff in State Bank of Mysore, State Bank of Patiala, State Bank of Travancore, State Bank of Bikaner and Jaipur, and State Bank of Hyderabad, by transmitting even the works done presently by the managers to the lower cadre staff.
title: Bank employees stage protest
